channel.title: A quick question
channel.description: Does anyone know how I would go about learning to make a gui for my programs. I am taking a class and it is moving very slow. I need to know how to make a gui for later in the year and need something to do to practice programming. (IF anyone wants to tell me how to make a gui that would be great)

item.title: A quick question
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

why the fuck would you follow Frell’s tutorial when there is a much better one available?

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:240745”]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,162314.0.html

Frell’s tut is good for retards, but there’s loads of errors in the samples so you actually have to learn it.[/quote]
All works except for simple convention errors, and the code is fugly. But i guess its a start ?

Read full topic

item.title: A quick question
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

JFrame jf = new JFrame(“foo”);
JPanel jp = new JPanel();
jp.add(shit);
jf.add(jp);
jf.pack();
jf.setVisible(true);
